short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily convert from one currency to another

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert from one currency to another.
No need to launch a search engine and search for other currency conversion websites. Just install this extension and the latest exchange rate is always at your fingertips.
